bibl.title: The Growth and Impact of Agricultural Tenancy in Jewish Palestine (III BCE- I CE). Avec résumés en anglais et en français.
bibl.note: Tenancy contracts in the early Roman period. - Indications of leasing and farm tenancy in the Hellenistic period. - The expansion of estates and its effects on labor. - Day labor. - Concluding remarks.
bibl.seg: Kloppenborg John S., The Growth and Impact of Agricultural Tenancy in Jewish Palestine (III BCE- I CE). Avec résumés en anglais et en français.

Tenancy contracts in the early Roman period. - Indications of leasing and farm tenancy in the Hellenistic period. - The expansion of estates and its effects on labor. - Day labor. - Concluding remarks.
